publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-486.1 Mr Kenny MacAskill: Sustainable Development—As an amendment to motion (S1M-486) in the name of Sarah Boyack, inset at end "and urges the Scottish Executive, in order to fulfil that commitment, to prepare, through consultation, a strategy for implementation including an analysis of principal issues to be addressed, an indication of the targets and standards expected to be met, arrangements for independent monitoring, and strategic direction for those expected to meet such commitments."
